title: Innovation Capability Assessment
subtitle: Evaluate your organization's innovation readiness and potential

instructions.title: How to Complete This Assessment
steps: Rate each dimension on a scale of 1-5
Be honest and objective in your evaluation
Consider both current capabilities and future potential

columns.title: Innovation Dimensions
columns.content: Key areas that determine innovation success

points.description: Evaluate how well your organization encourages creative thinking and new ideas
Assess your systems and processes for managing innovation
Rate your team's innovation capabilities and expertise
Measure leadership commitment and strategic alignment to innovation

consentText: I understand that this assessment will help identify areas for improving innovation capabilities
